meanings: Adverb 옛글투 또는 반어적 <질문부탁 등을 할 때 please와 같은 의미로 씀>
Noun 전경기(기도·명상 때 돌리는 바퀴 모양의 경전)

meanings.meaning: Power Resounds Around You Enabling Renewal
Praise Repent Ask Yield Expect and Rejoice
Positive Reassuring Action Yielding Eternal Results

vlive.korean: 에? 염불 외우세요 혹시? What? Are you memorizing a Buddhist prayer? 듣기 View video 졸잼티비 (joLjamTV) : [theHybrid] 공허함이 가득한 핫젝 오빠들 _ ep8

vlive.korean: [꿈은 이루어진다] - 너가 갖고 있어? - 간절히 기도하면 되는 거야? [Dream comes true] - Did you have that? - Prayer makes a wish come true? 듣기 View video YG 보석함 (YG TREASURE BOX) : YG보석함ㅣCHRISTMAS PARTY
vlive.english: [Dream comes true] - Did you have that? - Prayer makes a wish come true?
